name: Mixeur REMASTERED [DEMO]
description:
WARNING: this may contain some little very little bugs Welcome to Mixeur Remastered(DEMO)! You are a little blender called Mixeur  That has to get all the 8 items in each fridge,blender, and airfryer? This is the remaster of a game called Mixeur(as you can see) which was made for a game jam, so it now has:
  • Better Artwork/Graphics
  • FRIDGE MUSIC REMIX OH YEAH
  • More worlds
  • Basically everything we couldnt add in the first game
  • Better menu
  • Options!!!
This is not a finished result,only a demonstration, so please wait!
